title: New: Sina. – From Love To Dust EP
content:
Belfast based beat maker Sina.

has a new EP entitled ‘from love to dust’, a series of 3 tracks and 3 remixes that absorb, mutter to and ultimately consume a listener.

In all honesty, Sina. isn’t necessarily doing anything abstractly different from his contemporaries, yet his work still manages to haunt. This in many ways is down to the production; it’s the records sweeping clarity of samples that makes the whole thing far more vivid than other beat-makers of our age.

Definitely one to watch. Stream the whole record below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
